text: Tell Me That You Love Me, Junie Moon is a 1970 American comedy-drama movie directed by Otto Preminger and was based on the 1968 novel of the same name by Marjorie Kellogg. It stars Liza Minnelli, Ken Howard, Robert Moore, James Coco, Kay Thompson, Fred Williamson, Ben Piazza, Leonard Frey, Anne Revere, Clarice Taylor and Angelique Pettyjohn and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1970 comedy-drama movies Category:1970 LGBT movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Otto Preminger Category:Movies set in Massachusetts Category:Movies about disabilities Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies
title: Tell Me That You Love Me, Junie Moon
